hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"A man asked the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) which deed is best. He said: 'Faith in Allah.' He said: 'Then what?' He said: 'Jihad in the cause of Allah.' He said: 'Then what?' He said: 'Hajjun Mabrur.'" [1] [1] Hajj, that is accepted, or free of sin
